summary: An ordinance relating to, and providing for, the payment of the cost and expense of the condemnation of 29th Avenue South, from Bennett Street to American Street; 28th Avenue South, from Bennett Street to Americus Street; 28th Avenue South, from Americus Street to Alaska Street, as established by Ordinance No. 39643; 30th Avenue South from Bennett Street to Edmunds Street; Edmunds Street, from 30th Avenue South to 32nd Avenue South, as provided for in Ordinance No. 45500 of the City of Seattle by the issuance and sale of bonds of the district created to pay therefor.
